Zardus is not the owner of the RPG. No one is. Zardus just maintains the 
website and he can't give you the position because he is not the Predacon 
Commander only Blackarachnia or Megatron can give you that position. In fact 
the last second in command who probably is the real one is BrightBlade. You 
are such a fucking liar.
